privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_content: Facility360 ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.
privacy.collect_content:
We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:

• Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and unit number
• Location Data: Your location when creating issues to help service providers locate and resolve problems efficiently
• Usage Information: App usage patterns, features accessed, and interaction data
• Issue Data: Photos, descriptions, and status of maintenance issues you report
• Device Information: Device type, operating system, unique device identifiers
privacy.use_content:
We use the collected information for:

• Providing and maintaining our services
• Processing and managing maintenance requests
• Communicating with you about issues and updates
• Improving our app and services
• Ensuring security and preventing fraud
• Complying with legal obligations
privacy.sharing_content:
We may share your information with:

• Service Providers: Technicians and maintenance personnel assigned to your issues
• Property Management: Building administrators and managers
• Service Partners: Third-party vendors who assist in providing our services
• Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights

We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.security_content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information:

• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Secure authentication using JWT tokens
• Regular security assessments and updates
• Access controls and authentication mechanisms
• Offline data storage using secure local databases
privacy.rights_content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
• Request deletion of your information
• Opt-out of certain data collection
• Withdraw consent for data processing
• Port your data to another service

To exercise these rights, please contact us through the app or at support@facilitymaintenance.com.
privacy.location_content:
We collect location data when you create maintenance issues to:

• Help service providers navigate to your location
• Verify issue locations within the property
• Improve service delivery efficiency

You can control location permissions through your device settings. Note that disabling location services may limit some app functionality.
privacy.retention_content:
We retain your information for as long as necessary to:

• Provide our services
• Comply with legal obligations
• Resolve disputes and enforce agreements

Issue data is typically retained for 2 years after resolution. You may request earlier deletion by contacting us.
privacy.children_content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacy.changes_content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by:

• Posting the new policy in the app
• Sending an email notification
• Displaying an in-app notification

Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.contact_content:
If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

Email: support@facilitymaintenance.com
Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567
Address: 123 Property Management Lane, Suite 100, City, State 12345

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.agreement_content: By accessing or using the Facility360 mobile application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this application.
terms.description_content:
Facility360 provides a platform for:

• Tenants to report and track maintenance issues
• Service providers to receive and manage work assignments
• Property administrators to oversee maintenance operations

The service includes mobile app access, issue tracking, assignment management, and related features.
terms.accounts_content:
To use our services, you must:

• Provide accurate, current, and complete information
• Maintain the security of your account credentials
• Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
• Be responsible for all activities under your account
• Not share your account with others

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms.use_content:
You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes. You must not:

• Submit false or fraudulent maintenance requests
• Harass, abuse, or harm other users or service providers
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the system
• Interfere with or disrupt the service
• Upload malicious code or harmful content
• Use the service for any illegal activities
• Impersonate another person or entity
terms.reporting_content:
When reporting maintenance issues:

• Provide accurate and detailed descriptions
• Upload relevant photos when applicable
• Respond promptly to service provider inquiries
• Allow reasonable access for repairs
• Report emergencies through appropriate channels

False or malicious reports may result in account suspension.
terms.sp_content:
Service providers agree to:

• Respond to assignments in a timely manner
• Perform work professionally and competently
• Provide accurate status updates
• Complete work within agreed timeframes
• Maintain appropriate licenses and insurance
• Respect tenant privacy and property
• Follow building rules and regulations
terms.ownership_content:
You retain ownership of content you submit (photos, descriptions, etc.). By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to:

• Use, store, and display the content
• Share content with relevant service providers
• Improve our services
• Comply with legal obligations

We do not claim ownership of your content.
terms.ip_content:
The Facility360 app, including its design, features, code, and content, is owned by us and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not:

• Copy, modify, or distribute the app
• Reverse engineer or decompile the software
• Remove copyright or proprietary notices
• Use our trademarks without permission
terms.liability_content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law:

• The service is provided "as is" without warranties
• We are not liable for service interruptions or data loss
• We are not responsible for third-party actions
• Our liability is limited to the fees paid (if any)
• We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages

Some jurisdictions do not allow liability limitations, so these may not apply to you.
terms.availability_content:
We strive to maintain service availability but:

• Cannot guarantee uninterrupted access
• May perform maintenance or updates
• May modify or discontinue features
• Are not liable for temporary unavailability

We will provide reasonable notice for planned maintenance.
terms.emergency_content:
For emergency maintenance issues (gas leaks, flooding, electrical hazards):

• Contact emergency services (911) first
• Then contact property management emergency line
• Do not rely solely on the app for emergencies

The app is not intended for emergency communications.
terms.termination_content:
We may terminate or suspend your access:

• For violation of these terms
• For fraudulent or illegal activity
• At our discretion with or without notice
• If required by law

Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately. You may also terminate by closing your account.
terms.dispute_content:
Any disputes arising from these terms or use of the service will be:

• First attempted to be resolved through good faith negotiation
• If unresolved, subject to binding arbitration
• Governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where the property is located

You waive the right to participate in class-action lawsuits.
terms.changes_content:
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of changes through:

• In-app notifications
• Email announcements
• Updated terms posted in the app

Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.indemnification_content:
You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from:

• Your use of the service
• Your violation of these terms
• Your violation of any rights of others
• Content you submit
terms.severability_content: If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.
terms.contact_content:
For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

Email: legal@facilitymaintenance.com
Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567
Address: 123 Property Management Lane, Suite 100, City, State 12345
